title: Textile, 1800–50
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: White cotton, printed by roller, small scale all-over design or roses, morning glories, etc. in reds, blues, yellow, green (blue and yellow, now turned blue), brown for stems and picotage. Glazed; selvages present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1800–50.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. 1957-112-1.
